Sentence.string: Were you informed that your wife was being unfaithful to you with Marcus ?
If you’re asking me this question, that’s because you know I was.
I was dismayed. I trusted Marcus. He was a loyal friend. I was really angry with him but I finally came to terms with it. Knowing Marcus, I thought it wouldn’t have lasted a long time.
Even when you learnt that they would leave the city for making a fresh start ?
Your wife told me that you knew everything.
How could she inflict this on me ? Oh Rose ...
I must conclude that you didn’t know ?
No detective, I’m flabbergasted to be honest … How could they … ? I need a moment alone Detective, thank you.
